field.name: summary
field.value: Open Generics won't resolve with LateBoundComponent Implementation

field.name: description
field.value:
UsingFactoryMethod can never be called for an open generic service. There is a TODO in DefaultGenericHandler.cs refering to this.
Exception thrown when UsingFactoryMethod with Open Generic Type is:
An unhandled exception of type 'System.InvalidOperationException' occurred in mscorlib.dll
Additional information: Castle.Core.Internal.LateBoundComponent is not a GenericTypeDefinition. MakeGenericType may only be called on a type for which Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition is true.
Fix and Test here: https://github.com/rdrawsky/Windsor/commit/063db4b78a289ff4983c77dcd22cb6500ab38503
